description: Foundation border width tokens - Semantic border width values that reference primitive border width tokens. Maintains consistency of border thickness across the interface.

0.usage: No border - borderless elements, ghost buttons

1.usage: Hairline border - subtle separation, dividers, input fields

2.usage: Standard border - buttons, cards, modals, default elements

3.usage: Medium border - emphasized buttons, focus states, selected items

4.usage: Thick border - strong emphasis, active states, error states
